name: Svlcvss tech demos
description:
Svlcvss demos, based on famous "stardust" tunel technique but some of them taken to next levels.  Source codes included.

Svlcvss D - reimplementation of Stardust tunnel, all with mirroring the lower half of the screen. Suitable for A500

Svlcvss MMXVIII - Sturdust tunnel that can actually rotate. AGA 

Svlcvss Side Track - Sturdust tunnel that shifts the lines on x axis making the curves. AGA

Source codes for engines are included. A bit messy and not commented well but the technique is actually simple so I think its not that hard to understand. However I'm here open to any questions. Source codes are in Blitz Basic. Use them freely. As I dont have much spare time, I got twins for xmas, I'd really like if someone would make a game out of this. I would connect him with gfx artist that already mastered preparing gfx for these tunnels.
